name: legendverse 0.1
description:
-controls-

A/W/S/D = walk

Z= skill 1

X = skill 2

C = skill 3

V = skill 4

E = skill 5

Q = skill 6

   -warnings-

just like the previous projects are just an alpha project, depending on the feedback I can continue and develop, constructive ideas always well accepted

the player will have access to a lot of money to see how the powers behave and if any bugs

 -masks-

(null, dough, fire, control, poison, cosmic, time, ice, dark, sand)

-update-

2 new masks

upgrade system

new map (4 slands)

implemented stamina system

first side quest

fourth skill implemented to fire

damage fix

-future update-

2 new masks ( thunder, light)

the status of MANTRA (MAN) will have interesting uses for users

cave challenge
